items.name: Douglas Bay VR Immersion
items.short_description: Step into a virtual reality journey exploring Douglas Bay's history and marine life, offering a truly unique perspective of the island's capital.

items.name: Manx Spirit Craft Distillery
items.short_description: Discover the art of artisan gin and whisky production on the Isle of Man with a guided tour, followed by a tutored tasting of their unique spirits.

items.name: The Manx Yarn Gallery
items.short_description: A contemporary textile art gallery showcasing local and international artists, with a focus on traditional Manx crafts reimagined for the modern era.

items.name: Douglas Waterfront Food Hall
items.short_description: A vibrant indoor market featuring diverse local and international street food vendors, live music, and artisan produce right on the waterfront.

items.name: Manx Marine & Coastal Hub
items.short_description: An interactive center dedicated to the Isle of Man's marine biodiversity, offering educational exhibits, touch tanks, and guided coastal walks.

items.name: Summit Walls Douglas
items.short_description: Challenge yourself at Douglas's premier indoor bouldering and climbing center, catering to all skill levels from beginners to experienced climbers.
items.address: Braddan Bridge Industrial Estate, Douglas, IM4 4HL

items.name: Manx Time Lock Escape Rooms
items.short_description: Immerse yourself in thrilling, Manx-themed escape rooms, challenging your wits and teamwork against the clock to uncover island secrets.

items.name: Douglas Star Gazer's Lounge
items.short_description: Experience the wonders of the night sky at this modern observatory with powerful telescopes, public viewing sessions, and an integrated cafe.

items.name: Douglas E-Bike Explorer
items.short_description: Rent electric bikes to explore Douglas and its stunning coastal paths with ease, complemented by a cozy cafe offering local snacks and refreshments.

items.name: Aura Wellness & Hydro Spa
items.short_description: A serene urban oasis offering rejuvenating hydrotherapy pools, bespoke spa treatments, and relaxation zones for ultimate indulgence.
